column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////We had couple of tapas and they were all really delicious
column2: it's a very crowded place so I highly recommend a reservation. The only thing that really bothered me is that the host at the front table was so rude and impolite
column3: she was behaving like we are there to get free food. I had a reservation for 3 and when I talked to her she was kinda yelling at me and then very rude way told me we have no table for you now go sit at the bar till I call you!!! I definitely liked the place but I think the host who makes the first impression of a restaurant should be a nicer well behaved person.
